scripts.docs:build:html: sudo docker run --rm -v ${PWD}/docs:/docs -v /opt/sphinx_rtd_theme/sphinx_rtd_theme:/docs/source/_themes/sphinx_rtd_theme sphinxdoc/sphinx make html
scripts.docs:build:pdf: sudo docker run --rm -v ${PWD}/docs:/docs -v /opt/sphinx_rtd_theme/sphinx_rtd_theme:/docs/source/_themes/sphinx_rtd_theme sphinxdoc/sphinx-latexpdf make latexpdf
